call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - October 17th 2024

decisions.decision: Try Zoom call format instead of Spaces for once
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: HQx proposed trying a more open discussion format
decisions.quote: there is a proposal by HQx to make, to try at least for once to do instead of Spaces, something like Zoom call writes

commitments.commitment: Will describe 6.0 activation mechanics on the forum
commitments.quote: So yeah, I will describe mechanics on the forum

commitments.commitment: Will do more checks on 6.0 features
commitments.quote: And then, yeah, so all the features are ready for 6.0, but yeah, I will do more checks

commitments.commitment: Will write another forum post about security
commitments.quote: Yeah, I mean, but for security, you know, so I'm willing to write another forum post someday

open_questions.question: Need to discuss 6.0 and the approach for soft compatibility
open_questions.context: Still testing RocksDB version with few people

open_questions.question: How sub-blocks feature would be called
Options for possible SigmaUSD bank update
open_questions.context: Three possible options mentioned but needs more discussion

key_facts.fact: Already having in DevNet both 5.0 and 6.0 nodes coexisting with sub-blocks per blocks parameter being voted on by 6.0
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: 6.0.0 alpha 2 version of the protocol client released with all the 6.0 soft fork features
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts mining pool is up to 72, 73 gigahash
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: DuckPools has 84,000 out of 300,000 raised for the DAO
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Ledger, Trezor and Flex UIs are done for Raffles
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: One NFT was sold for 2500 ERG on Auction House three years ago
